```{r echo=F, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load Data
require(jsonlite)
require(tidyverse)
source("prosodylabRhelper.R")

pathStudy = getwd()
studyFileName = 'rhyme.txt'

pathData = paste0(pathStudy,'/data')
pathStudyFile = paste0(pathStudy,'/',studyFileName)

results = importData(pathData,pathStudyFile)

d = results$data
experimentSettings = results$settings

```



```{r}

d %>%
  filter(experiment=='trialPart == 'question1') %>%
  ggplot(d, aes(x=Exclusive, y=mean.value, fill=Syntax))


```
